remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅在 的实例和 之间执行转换。The class only converts an instance of to and from a . 此外，该命令必须是现有命令，或者必须将分配到的公共静态属性或公共静态字段。Also, the command must be an existing command, or must be assigned to a public static property or public static field.

span.span: cannot be converted.
